Donate

Events

Each year our donors and supporters help raise much needed funds through events.

Everyone loves a good party – especially a party with a cause. Whether it is a gala, golf tournament or walk, our donors can feel good knowing they are helping our hospitals and health care centres provide the very best care to patients from all over our province.

Cases for Support

  • Each year, hundreds of caring individuals and groups raise money for VGH & UBC Hospital Foundation in their own creative way by hosting Independent Community Events.
  • Visit our Event Calendar section regularly for upcoming events.
